content.rendered:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CKg2BPMBV98

The real life of a full-time entrepreneur is not easy. Yes, it’s great to live in the penthouse suite, drive a nice car, travel the world, buy designer clothing…

Let’s look at the darker side of entrepreneurship which includes little-to-no sleep, missing family special occasions, financial and emotional stresses on family, loss in your personal health…

Not everyone is meant to carry the title of entrepreneur. I’ll be 100% honest with you, this is a title that I am proud to own, and carry. It is a tough never-ending journey, but I have no regrets and I am ready for any battle that will come my way.

 

Chris A. Hughes
